#labels Procedures
Increments the command_queue reference count.

Interface to OpenCL [http://www.khronos.org/registry/cl/sdk/1.1/docs/man/xhtml/clRetainCommandQueue.html clRetainCommandQueue].

== Interface ==

<code language="Fortran">
subroutine clRetainCommandQueue(command_queue, errcode_ret)
  type(cl_command_queue), intent(inout) :: command_queue
  integer,                intent(out)   :: errcode_ret
end subroutine clRetainCommandQueue
</code>
